# monospaced

**Type Property**

A font with a monospace appearance.

## Declaration

```swift
static let monospaced: NSFontDescriptor.SystemDesign
```

## Designs

- **default**: The default font design.
- **rounded**: A font with a rounded appearance.
- **serif**: A font with a serif design.

items.description: A font with a rounded appearance.
items.name: rounded

items.description: A font with a serif design.
